name: tasting
title: Tea Tasting Atelier
description: In this atelier, you'll learn how to taste and evaluate different types of tea, and how to identify the unique flavor and aroma profiles of each.

name: brewing
title: Tea Brewing Atelier
description: Perfect your tea brewing technique in this atelier, where you'll learn the ideal temperature and steeping times for different types of tea.

name: pairing
title: Tea and Food Pairing Atelier
description: Discover the art of pairing tea with food in this atelier, where you'll learn how to match different teas with different flavors and textures.

name: health
title: Tea and Health Atelier
description: Explore the health benefits of tea in this atelier, where you'll learn about the science behind the various health claims associated with different types of tea.

name: culture
title: Tea History and Culture Atelier
description: Travel back in time with this atelier, where you'll learn about the fascinating history and cultural traditions of tea.
